charges.charge_description: 18:1952 INTERSTATE TRAVEL IN THE COMMISSION OF AN UNLAWFUL ACTIVITY (Count 1: $250,000-5 yrs; S/A $100.00; 3 yrs Supervised Release) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 53 1/2 months-$1,000.00; S/A $100.00; 3 years supervised release; 150 hrs of community service within the first 2 years of supervised release; fine and special assessment to be paid during the 1st 18 months of supervised release; defendant must make himself available for substance abuse testing and/or treatment once within 1st 15 days of release and twice more over the term of supervision; deft to seek and maintain employment; Court recommends that deft attend a drug treatment program while incarcerated; deft is to be incarcerated as close to his home in New Jersey as possible (to the extent possible) (1)
